sourceAssetId.description: The unique identifier for the asset in the Source system

sourceId.description: The identifier for the instance of the source

sourceType.description: The type of the source, e.g. microsoft, dropbox, etc

sourceUrl.description: A URL for accessing this asset in the source system

sourceName.description: The name of the asset in the source

sourceSize.description: The size of the binary of the source asset

sourceMimeType.description: MIME type of the source asset

sourceSha256.description: Computed SHA-256 hash of the source asset

hash.description: A hash value of the source asset as determined by the extraction source

created.description: The date on which the asset was created in the source system

createdBy.description: An identifier for the principal which created the asset in the source system

lastModified.description: The date on which the asset was last modified in the source

lastModifiedBy.description: An ID for the principal whom last updated the asset in the source system

path.description: The path to the asset in the source system

version.description: The version of the current asset in the source system

extractedSourceMetadata.description: Metadata extracted from the source asset

thumbnailSize.description: The size of the thumbnail of the source asset

thumbnailWidth.description: The width of the thumbnail of the source asset

thumbnailHeight.description: The height of the thumbnail of the source asset

extractedThumbnailMetadata.description: Metadata extracted from the source asset thumbnail

sourceMetadata.description: Additional metadata extracted from the source

url.title: A URL from which the binary can be retrieved

headers.description: Headers required to be passed along with the request to the URL

thumbnailKey.description: Temporary name of the thumbnail to use

jobId.description: An identifier for an execution of extracting assets from a source

batchId.description: An identifier for the batch of assets within a job

requestId.description: An identifier for a specific request, should be stable across retries of a request

companyId.description: An identifier for the company to which the asset belongs in Content Lake

spaceId.description: An identifier for the space to which the asset belongs in Content Lake
